daedalusTransfer.error.noTransferTxError: !!!There is no transaction to be sent.
daedalusTransfer.errorPage.title.label: !!!Unable to restore Daedalus wallet.
daedalusTransfer.form.instructions.step0: !!!Enter the 12-word recovery phrase used to back up your Daedalus wallet to restore the balance and transfer all the funds from Daedalus to Yoroi.
daedalusTransfer.form.instructions.step1: !!!It will take about 1 minute to restore your balance. In the next step, you will be presented with a transaction that will move all of your funds from Daedalus to Yoroi. Please review the details of the transaction carefully. You will need to pay a standard transaction fee on the Cardano network to make the transaction.
daedalusTransfer.form.instructions.title: !!!Instructions
daedalusTransfer.instruction.attention.a: !!!Use the 12-word recovery phrase to transfer all of the funds from your Daedalus wallet to Yoroi.
!!!Use the <receive screen> to generate a new address and use it to send funds from Daedalus.
!!!Do you have access to a working copy of your Daedalus wallet?

!!!Yoroi and Daedalus wallets use different key derivation schemes and they each have a separate format for addresses. For this reason, you cannot continue with your Daedalus wallet and must instead create a Yoroi wallet and transfer your funds (this will change in the future). Daedalus and Yoroi wallets are fully compatible for transferring funds. If you don’t have a working copy of Daedalus, you can use your 12-word recovery phrase to transfer the balance from Daedalus into Yoroi.
daedalusTransfer.instructions.instructio: !!!Before you can transfer funds from your Daedalus wallet, you must create a Yoroi wallet and back it up. Upon completion, you will receive a 15-word recovery phrase which can be used to restore your Yoroi wallet at any time.
daedalusTransfer.summary.addressTo.label: !!!To
daedalusTransfer.title: !!!Transfer funds from Daedalus
daedalusTransfer.waiting.title.label: !!!Daedalus wallet is being restored

global.passwordInstructions: !!!Note that password needs to be at least 7 characters long, and have at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number.

settings.support.logs.content: !!!If you want to inspect logs, you can {downloadLogsLink}. Logs do not contain sensitive information, and it would be helpful to attach them to problem reports to help the team investigate the issue you are experiencing.
settings.support.logs.title: !!!Logs
settings.support.reportProblem.content: !!!If the FAQ does not solve the issue you are experiencing, please use our {supportRequestLink} feature.
settings.support.reportProblem.title: !!!Reporting a problem
testnet.label.message: !!!Warning: This is a testnet. ADA on the testnet has no monetary value. For more information, check out the FAQ at {faqLink}
wallet.add.dialog.restoreNotificationMes: !!!Wallet restoration is currently in progress. Until it completes, it is not possible to restore or import new wallets.
wallet.add.dialog.title.label: !!!Add wallet
wallet.add.page.title: !!!Add Wallet
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.che: !!!Make sure nobody looks into your screen unless you want them to have access to your funds.
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.rec:
!!!On the following screen, you will see a set of X random words. This is
    your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Yoroi in order
    to back up or restore your wallet’s funds and private key.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.display.di:
!!!Please, make sure you have carefully written down your recovery phrase somewhere safe.
    You will need this phrase to use and restore your wallet. Phrase is case sensitive.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.entry.dial: !!!I understand that my money is held securely on this device only, not on the company servers.

!!!I understand that if this application is moved to another device or deleted, my money can
    be only recovered with the backup phrase that I have written down and saved in a secure place.
!!!Tap each word in the correct order to verify your recovery phrase
